worker-has-eligible-docs.required: Tell us if the worker has any of the listed documents or evidence

start-work-date.required: Tell us when the worker started working for you
start-work-date.date: Enter a real worker start date
start-work-date.after: Enter a real date when the worker started working for you
start-work-date.before: The worker start date must be today or in the past

use-digital-right-to-work.required: Tell us if you are unable to use a digital Right to Work service

person-work-for-you.required: Tell us if the worker already works for you

work-for-you-result-of-tupe-transfer.required: Tell us if the worker works for you as a result of a TUPE transfer

tupe-date.required: Tell us when the worker works for you as a result of a TUPE transfer
tupe-date.date: Enter a real TUPE transfer date
tupe-date.after: TUPE transfer date must be after ({{diff}}) the worker started working for you
tupe-date.before: TUPE transfer date must be today or in the past
